#Text=Íngrid Betancourt returns to France
#Text=Friday , July 4 , 2008
#Text=Freed hostage

#Text=Íngrid Betancourt arrived in France today , two days after being rescued from the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia ( FARC ) , who had kept her captive in the Colombian jungle for more than six years .
#Text=Standing alongside President Nicolas Sarkozy at a military air base southwest of Paris , Betancourt said , " I cry with joy . "
#Text=The Colombian-French politician was greeted at the air base by the President and the First Lady , Carla Bruni-Sarkozy , along with some supporters .
#Text=" I have been dreaming for seven years of this moment .

#Text=I owe everything to you ,  she said , thanking France for pressuring Colombia to " think of other than military options " .

_	_	_	_
8-25	736-737	.	_	_	_	_

#Text=She added ,  France is my home and you are my family . "

column1: #Text=Sarkozy said her safe return shows people in difficult situations that " there is hope , light at the end of the tunnel . "
#Text=After the welcome at the air base , which was broadcast live on national television , Betancourt went to the Élysée Palace , the President 's official residence .
#Text=Again accompanied by Sarkozy , she recounted her experiences as a hostage in the Colombian jungle , describing the lack of sunlight and hostile conditions .
#Text=" It 's a completely hostile environment with dangerous animals , " Betancourt said .
#Text=" The most dangerous , of course , is man .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=She called on Sarkozy to continue working toward freeing the hostages who were left behind .

#Text= We cannot leave them there where they are suffering , where they are alone , " she stated , saying that some of them are contemplating suicide .

column1: #Text=In response , Sarkozy said , " We will carry on working to free them . "
#Text=Betancourt was one of the 15 hostages rescued on July 2 by the Colombian army , who tricked FARC into handing over the hostages by pretending to be part of a non-governmental organization .
#Text=She was kidnapped in February 2002 while campaigning for President of Colombia .
#Text=At a press conference , her third public event in the hours since returning to France , Betancourt condemned the actions of FARC . "

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=I think the whole world is aware of the fact that FARC inflicts suffering on human beings  , she said , calling on the guerrilla organization to " accept defeat gracefully " and " stop being terrorists . "

_	_	_	_

#Text=She called on the international community to help end the  terrible trend of kidnapping in Colombia " .

column1: #Text=Betancourt also rejected the idea that the rescue operation was staged to cover up ransom payments to FARC .
#Text=" I think what I saw was certainly not a staged event , " she said .
#Text=" There was a degree of tension . "
